Senior Web Developer About Us:Vincent Design Inc. is an Indigenous-led creative marketing agency specializing in branding, design for print and marketing materials, web design and development, marketing campaigns, video, app design and development, database management systems, programming, large-scale publication layouts, promotional material design, road-mapping/marketing strategies, and consulting. We are committed to celebrating Indigenous culture and promoting diversity and inclusion in the workplace. Our agency is located in Winnipeg, MB.Key Responsibilities:Lead the design, development, and optimization of our WordPress websites, themes, and plugins.Collaborate closely with design, content, and marketing teams to deliver high-impact web solutions.Architect, develop, and maintain complex WordPress applications and custom plugins.Mentor and guide junior developers, ensuring best practices are followed.Evaluate and implement advanced SEO strategies within the WordPress framework.Address high-level technical issues and ensure website security and scalability.Stay abreast of the latest WordPress developments and drive innovation.Requirements:Minimum of 5-7 of in-depth experience with WordPress development.Profound knowledge of PHP, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and MySQL.Demonstrated experience in custom theme and plugin development.A solid understanding of the latest web trends, technologies, and methodologies.Familiarity with web hosting, migration, and website performance optimization.Strong analytical and problem-solving skills.Proven track record in leading and delivering successful web projects.Nice to Have:Experience integrating WordPress with other platforms and services (e.g., CRMs, e-commerce systems).Proficiency in modern web development tools, like Webpack, Babel, and Node.js.Certifications or recognized training in WordPress or related fields.Experience with implementing web content accessibility guidelines (WCAG)Benefits:Competitive salaryComprehensive Extended health benefitsCompany-sponsored professional developmentJob Type: Full time - permanent Job Location:
Winnipeg, MB (seeking Winnipeg based, in office applicants only. No remote employment opportunities)
